name: F00920
value:
Control Technology

Elevate Your Riding Experience.

Discover the pinnacle of riding pleasure with Riese & Müller's Control Technology. Engineered for maximum safety and dynamism, this advanced system guarantees an exhilarating journey every time. Experience the seamless harmony of the perfectly tuned full suspension rear swing arm, delivering unparalleled sportiness and superior traction, even at top speeds. At the heart of Control Technology lies an active rear swing arm, complemented by optimized front wheel suspension and a co-sprung luggage carrier. Together, they ensure powerful propulsion and a sporty ride, all while minimizing energy loss. Welcome to a new level of riding enjoyment.

name: F01102
value:
Sleek frame. Serious power.

A sleek 750 Wh battery and Bosch motor deliver up to 100 km per charge. Add the bottle-sized PowerMore 250 for 50 km more — just clip it on and ride.

name: F01102
value:
Kiox 300 cockpit
The Kiox 300 display is perfect for sporty riders: it displays more than just fitness data, helping riders to optimise their training. It is even possible to pair it with heart rate monitors via Bluetooth. Map-free navigation (only in conjunction with a smartphone) completes the features of the Kiox 300. It can be intuitively operated using the LED Remote on the handlebars.
£47.00

name: F01102
value:
Integrated cockpit. Total control.

Tidy cables, smart tech. The optional cockpit with Kiox 300 display keeps your ride stats front and centre on a crisp colour screen. Adjust the stem for comfort or speed. Prefer simple? The standard Intuvia 100 still keeps it clean and clear. Switch modes on the fly with the LED Remote — colour-coded, at your fingertips.

name: F01102
value:
Connected e-bike.

RX Connect takes your riding experience to a new level. You can completely secure your bike with the optionally integrated RX Chip and matching RX Service. Activate ConnectRide Free in the first year free of charge: the RX Connect app shows the location of your bike, offers a digital motion alarm and automatically records rides with extensive riding statistics. To benefit permanently from this offer, you can then take advantage of the paid ConnectRide service.

name: F01102
value:
Confidence built in.

With optional Bosch ABS 2.0, sudden stops stay smooth — no skidding, no surprises. Powerful Magura disc brakes deliver instant control, and the rear light with brake light keeps you seen. A bright headlight and wide beam cut through the dark, lighting every ride.

name: F01102
value:
Comfort that smooths it all out.

Cobblestones, gravel, potholes — barely noticeable thanks to the suspension fork and seatpost. Add the comfort kit for a relaxed upright ride with a wide saddle and swept-back bars. Like riding on fresh tarmac, wherever you go.

name: F01102
value:
Ready for anything.

The MIK carrier system handles it all — bags, baskets, panniers, even a child seat (up to 27 kg). Swap accessories in seconds. Whatever you’re carrying, it’s secure, stable, and hassle-free.

It can be intuitively operated using the LED Remote on the handlebars.

Frame colour black matt*; dark red matt*; petrol matt*

A sleek 750 Wh battery and Bosch motor deliver up to 100 km per charge. Add the bottle-sized PowerMore 250 for 50 km more — just clip it on and ride.

name: F01105
value:
Ready for anything.

The MIK carrier system handles it all — bags, baskets, panniers, even a child seat (up to 27 kg). Swap accessories in seconds. Whatever you’re carrying, it’s secure, stable, and hassle-free.

name: F01105
value:
Integrated cockpit. Total control.

Tidy cables, smart tech. The optional cockpit with Kiox 300 display keeps your ride stats front and centre on a crisp colour screen. Adjust the stem for comfort or speed. Prefer simple? The standard Intuvia 100 still keeps it clean and clear. Switch modes on the fly with the LED Remote — colour-coded, at your fingertips.

name: F01105
value:
Connected e-bike.

RX Connect takes your riding experience to a new level. You can completely secure your bike with the optionally integrated RX Chip and matching RX Service. Activate ConnectRide Free in the first year free of charge: the RX Connect app shows the location of your bike, offers a digital motion alarm and automatically records rides with extensive riding statistics. To benefit permanently from this offer, you can then take advantage of the paid ConnectRide service.

name: F01105
value:
Confidence built in.

With optional Bosch ABS 2.0, sudden stops stay smooth — no skidding, no surprises. Powerful Magura disc brakes deliver instant control, and the rear light with brake light keeps you seen. A bright headlight and wide beam cut through the dark, lighting every ride.

name: F01105
value:
Comfort that smooths it all out.

Cobblestones, gravel, potholes — barely noticeable thanks to the suspension fork and seatpost. Add the comfort kit for a relaxed upright ride with a wide saddle and swept-back bars. Like riding on fresh tarmac, wherever you go.

It can be intuitively operated using the LED Remote on the handlebars.

name: F01120
value:
Enjoyable Riding Experience

From urban streets to rural roads, enjoy every moment.

Whether you're riding, charging the batteries, or securing it in the city, this full-suspension low-step-through bike ensures maximum comfort at all times. The charging socket is conveniently positioned ergonomically, allowing for easy charging directly on the bike. Additionally, the specially designed closing cap adds to the convenience. The lock is also ergonomically placed on the carrier, enabling swift locking and unlocking. For those seeking even more comfort, consider the optional comfort kit with curved handlebars and a wide saddle, or a saddle that can be lowered using a remote control.

name: F01120
value:
Safety equipment

Enhanced Safety Features.

Stay safe on the road at all times with the Homage's impressive array of safety features. Whether you need to brake suddenly or navigate tricky terrain, the optional Bosch eBike ABS 2.0 ensures you remain in control by preventing tire slippage, rear wheel lifting, and skidding. Even without this feature, the standard Magura disc brakes provide reliable stopping power when you need it most. Plus, the powerful Supernova M99 Mini Pro headlight ensures you're always visible in traffic and illuminates the road evenly in the dark. With its wide angle main beam, you'll have excellent visibility even in rural areas..

name: F01120
value:
Integrated Design Concept

Seamlessly Unified.

The frame design of the Homage leaves an indelible impression at first glance - and with every subsequent viewing. Alongside complete battery integration, the head and down tube meld seamlessly into a singular entity. You'll search in vain for welding seams - each frame receives meticulous finishing touches. The Bosch Performance Line CX motor with 85 Nm and the compact carrier with MIK system seamlessly merge into the frame design, leading observers to assume: the Homage must be forged as one piece. Moreover, the minimalist cockpit is fully integrated, offering a consistently clean and sophisticated view at all times.

name: F01120
value:
Control Technology

Elevate Your Riding Experience.

Discover the pinnacle of riding pleasure with Riese & Müller's Control Technology. Engineered for maximum safety and dynamism, this advanced system guarantees an exhilarating journey every time. Experience the seamless harmony of the perfectly tuned full suspension rear swing arm, delivering unparalleled sportiness and superior traction, even at top speeds. At the heart of Control Technology lies an active rear swing arm, complemented by optimized front wheel suspension and a co-sprung luggage carrier. Together, they ensure powerful propulsion and a sporty ride, all while minimizing energy loss. Welcome to a new level of riding enjoyment.

name: F01120
value:
Front carrier with bag
Stay mobile while carrying all your essentials. Secure up to 5 kg of luggage on the front carrier, attached to the frame and benefiting from the bike's full suspension, ensuring your cargo is well-protected from bumps and jolts. The bag provides ample space with a volume of up to 18 liters. With its zipper and roll closure, your belongings remain shielded from dirt and rain. Easily removable, the bag transforms into a shoulder bag using the supplied strap. Additionally, two outer pockets with waterproof zippers offer secure storage for smaller items.
The standard headlight is mounted on the handlebar, illuminating your path as you steer. Optionally, the headlight can be mounted on the front luggage carrier, ensuring excellent visibility ahead with its powerful beam.
£187.00

name: F01120
value:
Front carrier
Stay active while having all your essentials at hand. The front carrier allows you to safely secure up to 5 kg of luggage directly to the frame, ensuring it's protected from impacts and vibrations. With bungee cords, items like a sleeping bag, sports bag, or provisions can be quickly and securely fastened in place. You'll soon find the front luggage carrier to be an invaluable asset for your adventures.
£94.00

name: F01120
value:
Kiox 500 cockpit
The Kiox 500 display seamlessly integrates into the cockpit, enhancing aesthetics with internal cabling for a clean, minimalist appearance. Offering versatility, the adjustable stem angle allows riders to switch between a sportier or more upright seating position. With its large display and readability in challenging conditions, the Kiox 500 display is sure to impress. Designed for sportier rides, it tracks fitness data and can be paired with heart rate monitors via Bluetooth. When paired with a smartphone, map-free navigation adds further functionality to the Kiox 500. Intuitive operation is facilitated by the LED Remote on the handlebar.DualBattery Technology perfected by Riese & Müller ensures twice the range or far higher climbs, fewer charging breaks and longer-lasting riding pleasure. With the 1,250 Wh now available, completely new destinations can be reached and you no longer have to worry about the range in your daily routine.
£112.00

Battery Integration with DualBattery

Unleash the power within.

Whether you choose the standard setup with one battery (625 Wh) or the DualBattery option (1,250 Wh) for extended range and fewer charging stops, our complete battery integration sets a new standard for functionality. With strategically positioned batteries that minimally impact balance, the bike's sporty riding dynamics remain paramount. Plus, you can effortlessly remove the two batteries whenever needed.

name: F01150
value:
Safety First

Stay in Control and Visible with Advanced Safety Features

The Delite eBike prioritizes your safety, ensuring you’re secure on the road at all times. Its standout feature is the optional Bosch eBike ABS 2.0, which provides you with control during sudden braking scenarios. This advanced system reliably prevents tire slippage, rear wheel lifting, and sideways skidding. The bike’s standard Magura disc brakes also deliver a strong stopping force when needed. Visibility is key to safety, and with Delite’s powerful headlight featuring daytime running lights, you’re always clearly visible in traffic. The headlight not only illuminates the road evenly in the dark but also features a main beam with an extra-wide opening angle for clear visibility during out-of-town rides. With the Delite eBike, safety is never compromised.

name: F01150
value:

value:
Front carrier with bag
Keep on the move and still have everything with you. You can secure up to 5 kg of luggage on the front carrier, which is fixed to the frame and hence benefits from the bike’s full suspension, perfectly protecting your cargo from knocks and bumps. The bag offers space for a volume of up to 18 litres. Thanks to the zipper and roll closure, your transported goods are perfectly protected from dirt and rain. The bag can be removed quickly and easily and becomes a shoulder bag using the strap supplied. You can safely store smaller items in the two outer pockets equipped with waterproof zippers.
The headlight is fitted to the handlebar as standard, so that the light illuminates the road ahead as you turn the handlebar. On request, the headlight can also be fitted to the front luggage carrier. This alternative mounting position also guarantees outstanding illumination of the road ahead, thanks to the powerful headlight..

The Fox Float air suspension fork with 140 mm travel offers in combination with a first-class off-road package optimum riding conditions for discerning cyclists. With 15 finely adjustable rebound damping levels, this excellently manufactured air suspension fork can be tuned to any undertaking – whether uphill, downhill, field and forest tracks or asphalt. The solid tire studs on the shoulders of the Schwalbe Johnny Watts tires guarantee outstanding grip, especially when cornering. The wide VP 538 flat pedals provide grip for your feet. name: F01150
value:
Integrated Cockpit: Your Smart Control Centre

Seamless Integration and Smart Functionality at Your Fingertips.

The Delite eBike features a seamlessly integrated cockpit, neatly incorporated into the handlebar, boasting tidy cabling that adds to its sleek design. Whether you’re on an everyday commute or tackling challenging terrains, the Kiox 300 or the larger Kiox 500 display serve as your ideal smart companions. These displays allow you to monitor your trip and fitness data on a large, vibrant colour screen. The LED Remote offers a convenient way to select your riding mode, with the colour indicating your chosen mode. The adjustable stem angle allows you to customize your sitting position, ranging from comfortable to sporty, according to your preference. The standard Purion 200 display further enhances the tidy appearance of the cockpit, providing a clear overview of your speed, range, and other essential metrics. Experience smart control with the Delite eBike’s integrated cockpit.

name: F01150
value:
Control Technology

Unleashing Safety and Vigor with Riese & Müller

Elevate your cycling experience to new heights with Riese & Müller’s Control Technology. This innovative feature is the epitome of safety and vigor, offering maximum riding enjoyment. At its core, the perfectly tuned full suspension of the rear swing arm ensures a sporty ride and superior traction, even at high speeds. The active rear swing arm, optimized front wheel suspension, and co-sprung luggage carrier form the heart of the Control Technology, delivering powerful propulsion and a dynamic ride without any energy loss. The Suntour suspension fork, with a travel of 120 mm (or 140 mm with the GX option), guarantees a safe ride whether you’re traversing forest tracks, gravel, or asphalt roads. With Riese & Müller’s Control Technology, master the art of cycling and take control of your ride.

name: F01150
value:
Unleash the Power

Experience the Fusion of Speed, Power, and Innovation.

Discover a new dimension of cycling with the Riese & Müller Delite4 GT. This eBike is designed with a sporty frame geometry that promises an exhilarating ride. The heart of this machine is its fully integrated, removable 750 Wh battery, cleverly positioned to maintain a lightweight feel and promote agile handling. For those who crave more power, the bike comes with an optional Bosch PowerMore 250 Wh battery. Despite its compact size and light weight of just 1.6 kg, this additional battery packs a punch, offering an extra 50 km of ride time. So, whether you’re planning a spontaneous adventure or a long-distance journey, the Riese & Müller Delite4 GT eBike has got you covered. Experience the thrill of the ride without the worry of mid-trip charging. Embrace the freedom, embrace the power, with the Riese & Müller Delite4 GT eBike.

name: F01201
value:
Double Child Seat – Safe, flexible, and made for two.

£187.00

Comfortably seats two children up to age seven, with adjustable sitting and sleeping positions. Five-point harnesses keep them secure, and the headrest — made from 100% recycled material — folds flat when not in use. Need more space? Just fold up the seat to carry larger loads. Check local regulations before transporting children by bike.

name: F01201
value:
Glove Compartment Lock – Small items, safely stored.

£28.00

The glove compartment lock means small items are safely stowed away. The lock uses the same key as the battery lock and Abus frame lock and replaces the standard magnetic closure.

name: F01201
value:
Connected e-bike.

RX Connect takes your riding experience to a new level. You can completely secure your bike with the standard, integrated RX Chip and the RX Service to go along with it. Activate ConnectRide Free for one year free of charge: the RX Connect app shows the location of your bike, offers a digital motion alarm and automatically records rides with extensive riding statistics.

name: F01201
value:
Effortless to ride. Easy to live with.

The Packster2 70 handles like a pro — smooth to steer, simple to park, and easy to hop on and off. Its cable steering lets you glide through tight spots, even fully loaded. Need more space? The rear carrier adds room for up to 27 kg of extra cargo.

name: F01201
value:
Equipped for the future.

Smart, safe, and sustainable.

The EPP transport box is fully recyclable and made with zero emissions. Optional child seats include five-point belts and side-impact protection for peace of mind. Add the buggy kit for easy access with half-height side walls — all within a tough frame that supports the weather cover and shields your passengers.

name: F01201
value:
See clearly. Stay in control.

A powerful headlight with daytime running light and well-placed reflectors keeps you visible at all times. The optional Bosch ABS and Magura disc brakes add extra stopping power and control — preventing skids and slips, even in sudden stops.

name: F01201
value:
Additional Chain Lock with Vaude Bag – Extra security, neatly packed.
The 130 cm Abus chain lock pairs with the frame lock for added protection — tough 6 mm links that secure your bike to fixed objects or lock multiple bikes together. One key fits the frame, chain, and battery locks. The lock stows in a Vaude saddle bag made from 100% recycled polyester, with a roll-top design for quick, easy access. Note: May limit saddle height on smaller frames.
£47.00

name: F01201
value:
Bosch eBike ABS 2.0 – Control when it counts.
Stay firmly in the saddle, even under hard braking. On asphalt or gravel, ABS 2.0 prevents skids, rear wheel lift, and sideways slips — for safer, more confident stops in any situation.
£466.00

name: F01201
value:
Comfort Kit – Sit back and relax.
With swept-back handlebars and a wide saddle, the Comfort Kit lets you ride in a relaxed, upright position — perfect for cruising in comfort.

name: F01201
value:
DualBattery 1500 – Go further. Climb higher.
With a massive 1,500 Wh of power, Riese & Müller’s DualBattery tech delivers double the range, fewer charging stops, and the freedom to take on bigger adventures — or just forget about range altogether in daily life.
£1212.00

name: F01201
value:
Kiox 300 – Smart, sporty, connected.
Track fitness, pair with heart rate monitors via Bluetooth, and navigate without maps when linked to your phone. The Kiox 300 puts training insights and ride control right at your fingertips — all operated through the intuitive LED Remote.
£47.00

name: F01201
value:
Offroad Kit – Grip that goes anywhere.
Tackle rough terrain with Schwalbe Smart Sam Plus tires. A wide centre tread keeps you rolling fast, while aggressive side lugs grip hard in corners. Plus, a 3 mm puncture guard adds tough protection where it counts.
£47.00

name: F01201
value:
Built for families. Better for the planet.

The Packster2 70 simplifies everyday life — and it’s made from eco-friendly materials throughout.

name: F01201
value:
Pannier Rack – Minimalist, functional, integrated.
Designed for up to 5 kg per side, this sleek rack keeps your panniers secure without adding bulk. Rear and brake lights are seamlessly built in — a clean look with smart function.

name: F01201
value:
Box with Flat Cover – Secure, weatherproof storage.

£159.00

This lockable cover shields up to 240 L of cargo from the elements. Made from folding polypropylene, it opens easily for quick loading and unloading.

name: F01201
value:
Double Child Seat with Front Luggage Shelf – Smart space for kids and cargo.

£243.00

Double Child Seat with Front Luggage Shelf – Flexible for family and cargo. Seats two children up to age seven with five-point belts and recycled headrests. The seat folds up for extra space. The front shelf holds a crate-sized load when down, or acts as a table with foot space when up. The 47 L food-safe box fits neatly on the rack or in a shopping trolley. Check local regulations before transporting children

name: F01201
value:
Buggy – Safe, smart, and built for little passengers.

£327.00

The Buggy option makes family transport easy and secure. Half-height side walls and a step let kids climb in and out with ease, while the sturdy aluminium frame and polypropylene roof offer extra protection — even in a collision. The water-repellent cover avoids PVC and includes tinted windows, roll-up sides, and a rear panel to shield against wind and rain. Max load: 70 kg. Please check local laws before transporting children by bike.

name: F01201
value:
Box with Tarpaulin – Weatherproof your load.

£75.00

The durable tarpaulin keeps cargo clean and dry in any weather. It can be half or fully rolled back, letting children ride comfortably while staying protected.

name: F01151
value:
Front carrier
Being sporty when out and about – and yet still having everything you need with you. You can secure up to 5 kg of luggage on the front carrier, fixed to the frame and hence co-sprung, perfectly protected from knocks and bumps. Bungee cords secure a sleeping bag, small sports bag or provisions in place in no time at all. And you’ll come to appreciate your front luggage carrier just as quickly.
£94.00

name: F01151
value:
Kiox 500 cockpit
The Kiox 500 display is perfectly integrated into the cockpit: the internal cabling creates a tidy, minimalist appearance. The adjustable angle of the stem lets you choose between a sportier or more upright seating position. The Kiox 500 display cannot fail to impress with its large display and ease of reading – even in challenging riding conditions. Ideal for sportier rides, it records your fitness data and can also be coupled to heart rate monitors by Bluetooth. Map-free navigation (only in conjunction with a smartphone) completes the features of the Kiox 500. It can be intuitively operated using the LED Remote on the handlebar.
£112.00

name: F01151
value:
Kiox 300 cockpit
The Kiox 300 display is perfectly integrated into the cockpit: the internal cabling creates a tidy, minimalist appearance. The adjustable angle of the stem lets you choose between a sportier or more upright seating position. The Kiox 300 display is perfect for sporty riders: it displays more than just fitness data, helping riders to optimise their training. It is even possible to pair it with heart rate monitors via Bluetooth. Map-free navigation (only in conjunction with a smartphone) completes the features of the Kiox 300. It can be intuitively operated using the LED Remote on the handlebars..
£75.00

name: F01151
value:
Integrated Cockpit: Your Smart Control Centre

Seamless Integration and Smart Functionality at Your Fingertips.

The Delite eBike features a seamlessly integrated cockpit, neatly incorporated into the handlebar, boasting tidy cabling that adds to its sleek design. Whether you’re on an everyday commute or tackling challenging terrains, the Kiox 300 or the larger Kiox 500 display serve as your ideal smart companions. These displays allow you to monitor your trip and fitness data on a large, vibrant colour screen. The LED Remote offers a convenient way to select your riding mode, with the colour indicating your chosen mode. The adjustable stem angle allows you to customize your sitting position, ranging from comfortable to sporty, according to your preference. The standard Purion 200 display further enhances the tidy appearance of the cockpit, providing a clear overview of your speed, range, and other essential metrics. Experience smart control with the Delite eBike’s integrated cockpit.

name: F01151
value:
Comfort kit
The perfect option for anyone wanting to ride in greater comfort: the classically curved handlebars and wider saddle enable you to sit comfortably in an upright position.
£0.00

name: F01151
value:
Control Technology

Unleashing Safety and Vigor with Riese & Müller

Elevate your cycling experience to new heights with Riese & Müller’s Control Technology. This innovative feature is the epitome of safety and vigor, offering maximum riding enjoyment. At its core, the perfectly tuned full suspension of the rear swing arm ensures a sporty ride and superior traction, even at high speeds. The active rear swing arm, optimized front wheel suspension, and co-sprung luggage carrier form the heart of the Control Technology, delivering powerful propulsion and a dynamic ride without any energy loss. The Suntour suspension fork, with a travel of 120 mm (or 140 mm with the GX option), guarantees a safe ride whether you’re traversing forest tracks, gravel, or asphalt roads. With Riese & Müller’s Control Technology, master the art of cycling and take control of your ride.

name: F01151
value:
Unleash the Power

Experience the Fusion of Speed, Power, and Innovation.

Discover a new dimension of cycling with the Riese & Müller Delite4 GT. This eBike is designed with a sporty frame geometry that promises an exhilarating ride. The heart of this machine is its fully integrated, removable 750 Wh battery, cleverly positioned to maintain a lightweight feel and promote agile handling. For those who crave more power, the bike comes with an optional Bosch PowerMore 250 Wh battery. Despite its compact size and light weight of just 1.6 kg, this additional battery packs a punch, offering an extra 50 km of ride time. So, whether you’re planning a spontaneous adventure or a long-distance journey, the Riese & Müller Delite4 GT eBike has got you covered. Experience the thrill of the ride without the worry of mid-trip charging. Embrace the freedom, embrace the power, with the Riese & Müller Delite4 GT eBike.

name: F01151
value:
Safety First

Stay in Control and Visible with Advanced Safety Features

The Delite eBike prioritizes your safety, ensuring you’re secure on the road at all times. Its standout feature is the optional Bosch eBike ABS 2.0, which provides you with control during sudden braking scenarios. This advanced system reliably prevents tire slippage, rear wheel lifting, and sideways skidding. The bike’s standard Magura disc brakes also deliver a strong stopping force when needed. Visibility is key to safety, and with Delite’s powerful headlight featuring daytime running lights, you’re always clearly visible in traffic. The headlight not only illuminates the road evenly in the dark but also features a main beam with an extra-wide opening angle for clear visibility during out-of-town rides. With the Delite eBike, safety is never compromised.

name: F01151
value:
Front carrier with bag
Keep on the move and still have everything with you. You can secure up to 5 kg of luggage on the front carrier, which is fixed to the frame and hence benefits from the bike’s full suspension, perfectly protecting your cargo from knocks and bumps. The bag offers space for a volume of up to 18 litres. Thanks to the zipper and roll closure, your transported goods are perfectly protected from dirt and rain. The bag can be removed quickly and easily and becomes a shoulder bag using the strap supplied. You can safely store smaller items in the two outer pockets equipped with waterproof zippers.
The headlight is fitted to the handlebar as standard, so that the light illuminates the road ahead as you turn the handlebar. On request, the headlight can also be fitted to the front luggage carrier. This alternative mounting position also guarantees outstanding illumination of the road ahead, thanks to the powerful headlight..
£187.00

name: F01151
value:
Pannier rack
The minimalist pannier rack is ideal for fixing panniers weighing up to 5 kg each. The rear and brake lights are unobtrusively integrated into it. The “Form follows function” design principle has been exceptionally well executed with the pannier rack
£0.00

name: F01151
value:
GX option with Fox suspension
The Fox Float air suspension fork with 140 mm travel offers in combination with a first-class off-road package optimum riding conditions for discerning cyclists. The GRIP damping system reliably absorbs shocks from stones, sticks or roots lying on the way and effortlessly compensates for unevenness. With 15 finely adjustable rebound damping levels, this excellently manufactured air suspension fork can be tuned to any undertaking – whether uphill, downhill, field and forest tracks or asphalt. The solid tire studs on the shoulders of the Schwalbe Johnny Watts tires guarantee outstanding grip, especially when cornering. The wide VP 538 flat pedals provide grip for your feet. The sporty saddle an the adjustable X-Fusion Manic seatpost simply make off-road riding an absolute joy
£559.00

name: F01151
value:
GX option
If you like riding your E-Bike off-road, then simply equip it with a first-class off-road package. The Suntour Aion air suspension fork with 140 mm travel reliably absorbs shocks and effortlessly compensates for any unevenness on the terrain. The solid tire studs on the shoulders of the Schwalbe Johnny Watts tires guarantee outstanding grip, especially when cornering. The wide VP 538 flat pedals provide grip for your feet. The sporty saddle an the adjustable X-Fusion Manic seatpost simply make off-road riding an absolute joy.
£187.00

name: F01151
value:
Bosch eBike ABS 2.0
The Bosch eBike ABS 2.0 ensures that you remain safely on the saddle even when you need to brake suddenly – on solid asphalt roads or gravel tracks. It prevents tires from slipping, the rear wheel lifting and the whole bike skidding out to the side.
£373.00

name: F01151
value:
750 Wh + Range Extender 250
The Bosch PowerMore 250 Wh additional battery supplements the power of the standard 750 Wh battery – for even greater range and flexibility. Only as big as a drinking bottle and weighing just 1.6 kg, it can be stowed away in a backpack or bike bag. And should you spontaneously decide to go on a longer trip, then just attach the energy reserve to the down tube and continue riding for another 50 km without the need to stop and charge.
£420.00

The Suntour Aion air suspension fork with 140 mm travel reliably absorbs shocks and effortlessly compensates for any unevenness on the terrain. The solid tire studs on the shoulders of the Schwalbe Johnny Watts tires guarantee outstanding grip, especially when cornering. The wide VP 538 flat pedals provide grip for your feet. The sporty saddle an the adjustable X-Fusion Manic seatpost simply make off-road riding an absolute joy.
£187.00

name: F01153
value:
Bosch eBike ABS 2.0
The Bosch eBike ABS 2.0 ensures that you remain safely on the saddle even when you need to brake suddenly – on solid asphalt roads or gravel tracks. It prevents tires from slipping, the rear wheel lifting and the whole bike skidding out to the side.
£373.00

name: F01153
value:
750 Wh + Range Extender 250
The Bosch PowerMore 250 Wh additional battery supplements the power of the standard 750 Wh battery – for even greater range and flexibility. Only as big as a drinking bottle and weighing just 1.6 kg, it can be stowed away in a backpack or bike bag. And should you spontaneously decide to go on a longer trip, then just attach the energy reserve to the down tube and continue riding for another 50 km without the need to stop and charge.
£420.00

name: F01153
value:
Kiox 500 cockpit
The Kiox 500 display is perfectly integrated into the cockpit: the internal cabling creates a tidy, minimalist appearance. The adjustable angle of the stem lets you choose between a sportier or more upright seating position. The Kiox 500 display cannot fail to impress with its large display and ease of reading – even in challenging riding conditions. Ideal for sportier rides, it records your fitness data and can also be coupled to heart rate monitors by Bluetooth. Map-free navigation (only in conjunction with a smartphone) completes the features of the Kiox 500. It can be intuitively operated using the LED Remote on the handlebar.
£112.00

name: F01153
value:
Kiox 300 cockpit
The Kiox 300 display is perfectly integrated into the cockpit: the internal cabling creates a tidy, minimalist appearance. The adjustable angle of the stem lets you choose between a sportier or more upright seating position. The Kiox 300 display is perfect for sporty riders: it displays more than just fitness data, helping riders to optimise their training. It is even possible to pair it with heart rate monitors via Bluetooth. Map-free navigation (only in conjunction with a smartphone) completes the features of the Kiox 300. It can be intuitively operated using the LED Remote on the handlebars..
£75.00

name: F01153
value:
Integrated Cockpit: Your Smart Control Centre

Seamless Integration and Smart Functionality at Your Fingertips.

The Delite eBike features a seamlessly integrated cockpit, neatly incorporated into the handlebar, boasting tidy cabling that adds to its sleek design. Whether you’re on an everyday commute or tackling challenging terrains, the Kiox 300 or the larger Kiox 500 display serve as your ideal smart companions. These displays allow you to monitor your trip and fitness data on a large, vibrant colour screen. The LED Remote offers a convenient way to select your riding mode, with the colour indicating your chosen mode. The adjustable stem angle allows you to customize your sitting position, ranging from comfortable to sporty, according to your preference. The standard Purion 200 display further enhances the tidy appearance of the cockpit, providing a clear overview of your speed, range, and other essential metrics. Experience smart control with the Delite eBike’s integrated cockpit.

name: F01153
value:
Safety First

Stay in Control and Visible with Advanced Safety Features

The Delite eBike prioritizes your safety, ensuring you’re secure on the road at all times. Its standout feature is the optional Bosch eBike ABS 2.0, which provides you with control during sudden braking scenarios. This advanced system reliably prevents tire slippage, rear wheel lifting, and sideways skidding. The bike’s standard Magura disc brakes also deliver a strong stopping force when needed. Visibility is key to safety, and with Delite’s powerful headlight featuring daytime running lights, you’re always clearly visible in traffic. The headlight not only illuminates the road evenly in the dark but also features a main beam with an extra-wide opening angle for clear visibility during out-of-town rides. With the Delite eBike, safety is never compromised.

name: F01153
value:
Control Technology

Unleashing Safety and Vigor with Riese & Müller

Elevate your cycling experience to new heights with Riese & Müller’s Control Technology. This innovative feature is the epitome of safety and vigor, offering maximum riding enjoyment. At its core, the perfectly tuned full suspension of the rear swing arm ensures a sporty ride and superior traction, even at high speeds. The active rear swing arm, optimized front wheel suspension, and co-sprung luggage carrier form the heart of the Control Technology, delivering powerful propulsion and a dynamic ride without any energy loss. The Suntour suspension fork, with a travel of 120 mm (or 140 mm with the GX option), guarantees a safe ride whether you’re traversing forest tracks, gravel, or asphalt roads. With Riese & Müller’s Control Technology, master the art of cycling and take control of your ride.

name: F01153
value:
Unleash the Power

Experience the Fusion of Speed, Power, and Innovation.

Discover a new dimension of cycling with the Riese & Müller Delite4 GT. This eBike is designed with a sporty frame geometry that promises an exhilarating ride. The heart of this machine is its fully integrated, removable 750 Wh battery, cleverly positioned to maintain a lightweight feel and promote agile handling. For those who crave more power, the bike comes with an optional Bosch PowerMore 250 Wh battery. Despite its compact size and light weight of just 1.6 kg, this additional battery packs a punch, offering an extra 50 km of ride time. So, whether you’re planning a spontaneous adventure or a long-distance journey, the Riese & Müller Delite4 GT eBike has got you covered. Experience the thrill of the ride without the worry of mid-trip charging. Embrace the freedom, embrace the power, with the Riese & Müller Delite4 GT eBike.

name: F01153
value:
Pannier rack
The minimalist pannier rack is ideal for fixing panniers weighing up to 5 kg each. The rear and brake lights are unobtrusively integrated into it. The “Form follows function” design principle has been exceptionally well executed with the pannier rack
£0.00

name: F01153
value:
Front carrier with bag
Keep on the move and still have everything with you. You can secure up to 5 kg of luggage on the front carrier, which is fixed to the frame and hence benefits from the bike’s full suspension, perfectly protecting your cargo from knocks and bumps. The bag offers space for a volume of up to 18 litres. Thanks to the zipper and roll closure, your transported goods are perfectly protected from dirt and rain. The bag can be removed quickly and easily and becomes a shoulder bag using the strap supplied. You can safely store smaller items in the two outer pockets equipped with waterproof zippers.
The headlight is fitted to the handlebar as standard, so that the light illuminates the road ahead as you turn the handlebar. On request, the headlight can also be fitted to the front luggage carrier. This alternative mounting position also guarantees outstanding illumination of the road ahead, thanks to the powerful headlight..
£187.00

name: F01153
value:
Front carrier
Being sporty when out and about – and yet still having everything you need with you. name: F01155
value:
Comfort kit
The perfect option for anyone wanting to ride in greater comfort: the classically curved handlebars and wider saddle enable you to sit comfortably in an upright position.
£0.00

name: F01121
value:
Kiox 500 cockpit
The Kiox 500 display seamlessly integrates into the cockpit, enhancing aesthetics with internal cabling for a clean, minimalist appearance. Offering versatility, the adjustable stem angle allows riders to switch between a sportier or more upright seating position. With its large display and readability in challenging conditions, the Kiox 500 display is sure to impress. Designed for sportier rides, it tracks fitness data and can be paired with heart rate monitors via Bluetooth. When paired with a smartphone, map-free navigation adds further functionality to the Kiox 500. Intuitive operation is facilitated by the LED Remote on the handlebar.DualBattery Technology perfected by Riese & Müller ensures twice the range or far higher climbs, fewer charging breaks and longer-lasting riding pleasure. With the 1,250 Wh now available, completely new destinations can be reached and you no longer have to worry about the range in your daily routine.
£112.00

name: F01121
value:
Comfort kit
The perfect option for anyone wanting to ride in greater comfort: the classically curved handlebars and wider saddle enable you to sit comfortably in an upright position.
£0.00

name: F01121
value:
Integrated Design Concept

Seamlessly Unified.

The frame design of the Homage leaves an indelible impression at first glance - and with every subsequent viewing. Alongside complete battery integration, the head and down tube meld seamlessly into a singular entity. You'll search in vain for welding seams - each frame receives meticulous finishing touches. The Bosch Performance Line CX motor with 85 Nm and the compact carrier with MIK system seamlessly merge into the frame design, leading observers to assume: the Homage must be forged as one piece. Moreover, the minimalist cockpit is fully integrated, offering a consistently clean and sophisticated view at all times.

name: F01121
value:
Control Technology

Elevate Your Riding Experience.

Discover the pinnacle of riding pleasure with Riese & Müller's Control Technology. Engineered for maximum safety and dynamism, this advanced system guarantees an exhilarating journey every time. Experience the seamless harmony of the perfectly tuned full suspension rear swing arm, delivering unparalleled sportiness and superior traction, even at top speeds. At the heart of Control Technology lies an active rear swing arm, complemented by optimized front wheel suspension and a co-sprung luggage carrier. Together, they ensure powerful propulsion and a sporty ride, all while minimizing energy loss. Welcome to a new level of riding enjoyment.

name: F01121
value:
GX option
If off-road cycling is your passion, enhance your E-Bike with premium Schwalbe all-terrain tires. Engineered with flat tire studs along the center of the tread, they offer minimal rolling resistance, enabling faster speeds on straight paths. Meanwhile, the sturdy tire studs on the tire's shoulders ensure exceptional grip, especially during cornering maneuvers.
£47.00

name: F01121
value:
Lowerable saddle
With the lowered saddle, you can easily come to a comfortable stop without needing to dismount. Controlled remotely, the saddle adjusts, allowing your feet to reach the ground effortlessly.
£94.00

name: F01121
value:
Front carrier with bag
Stay mobile while carrying all your essentials. Secure up to 5 kg of luggage on the front carrier, attached to the frame and benefiting from the bike's full suspension, ensuring your cargo is well-protected from bumps and jolts. The bag provides ample space with a volume of up to 18 liters. With its zipper and roll closure, your belongings remain shielded from dirt and rain. Easily removable, the bag transforms into a shoulder bag using the supplied strap. Additionally, two outer pockets with waterproof zippers offer secure storage for smaller items.
The standard headlight is mounted on the handlebar, illuminating your path as you steer. Optionally, the headlight can be mounted on the front luggage carrier, ensuring excellent visibility ahead with its powerful beam.
£187.00

name: F01121
value:
DualBattery 1250
Enhanced DualBattery Technology, developed by Riese & Müller, guarantees double the range or greater climbing capabilities, fewer charging stops, and extended riding enjoyment. With the introduction of the 1,250 Wh option, entirely new destinations become accessible, alleviating concerns about range limitations in your daily travels.
£1,119.00

name: F01121
value:
Front carrier
Stay active while having all your essentials at hand. The front carrier allows you to safely secure up to 5 kg of luggage directly to the frame, ensuring it's protected from impacts and vibrations. With bungee cords, items like a sleeping bag, sports bag, or provisions can be quickly and securely fastened in place. You'll soon find the front luggage carrier to be an invaluable asset for your adventures.
£94.00

name: F01121
value:
Battery Integration with DualBattery

Unleash the power within.

Whether you choose the standard setup with one battery (625 Wh) or the DualBattery option (1,250 Wh) for extended range and fewer charging stops, our complete battery integration sets a new standard for functionality. With strategically positioned batteries that minimally impact balance, the bike's sporty riding dynamics remain paramount. Plus, you can effortlessly remove the two batteries whenever needed.

name: F01121
value:
Kiox 300 cockpit
The Kiox 300 display seamlessly integrates into the cockpit, enhancing aesthetics with internal cabling for a clean, minimalist look. The adjustable stem angle offers versatility, allowing riders to choose between a sporty or upright seating position. Designed with sporty riders in mind, the Kiox 300 display provides more than just fitness data, aiding in training optimization. Additionally, it can be paired with heart rate monitors via Bluetooth for comprehensive performance tracking. Map-free navigation, available when paired with a smartphone, adds further functionality to the Kiox 300. Intuitive operation is facilitated by the LED Remote on the handlebars.
£75.00

name: F01121
value:
Enjoyable Riding Experience

From urban streets to rural roads, enjoy every moment.

Whether you're riding, charging the batteries, or securing it in the city, this full-suspension low-step-through bike ensures maximum comfort at all times. The charging socket is conveniently positioned ergonomically, allowing for easy charging directly on the bike. Additionally, the specially designed closing cap adds to the convenience. The lock is also ergonomically placed on the carrier, enabling swift locking and unlocking. For those seeking even more comfort, consider the optional comfort kit with curved handlebars and a wide saddle, or a saddle that can be lowered using a remote control.

name: F01121
value:
Safety equipment

Enhanced Safety Features.

Stay safe on the road at all times with the Homage's impressive array of safety features. Whether you need to brake suddenly or navigate tricky terrain, the optional Bosch eBike ABS 2.0 ensures you remain in control by preventing tire slippage, rear wheel lifting, and skidding. Even without this feature, the standard Magura disc brakes provide reliable stopping power when you need it most. Plus, the powerful Supernova M99 Mini Pro headlight ensures you're always visible in traffic and illuminates the road evenly in the dark. With its wide angle main beam, you'll have excellent visibility even in rural areas..

£75.00

name: F01124
value:
Safety equipment

Enhanced Safety Features.

Stay safe on the road at all times with the Homage's impressive array of safety features. Whether you need to brake suddenly or navigate tricky terrain, the optional Bosch eBike ABS 2.0 ensures you remain in control by preventing tire slippage, rear wheel lifting, and skidding. Even without this feature, the standard Magura disc brakes provide reliable stopping power when you need it most. Plus, the powerful Supernova M99 Mini Pro headlight ensures you're always visible in traffic and illuminates the road evenly in the dark. With its wide angle main beam, you'll have excellent visibility even in rural areas..

name: F01124
value:

With strategically positioned batteries that minimally impact balance, the bike's sporty riding dynamics remain paramount. Plus, you can effortlessly remove the two batteries whenever needed.

name: F01124
value:
Control Technology

Elevate Your Riding Experience.

Discover the pinnacle of riding pleasure with Riese & Müller's Control Technology. Engineered for maximum safety and dynamism, this advanced system guarantees an exhilarating journey every time. Experience the seamless harmony of the perfectly tuned full suspension rear swing arm, delivering unparalleled sportiness and superior traction, even at top speeds. At the heart of Control Technology lies an active rear swing arm, complemented by optimized front wheel suspension and a co-sprung luggage carrier. Together, they ensure powerful propulsion and a sporty ride, all while minimizing energy loss. Welcome to a new level of riding enjoyment.

name: F01124
value:
Integrated Design Concept

Seamlessly Unified.

The frame design of the Homage leaves an indelible impression at first glance - and with every subsequent viewing. Alongside complete battery integration, the head and down tube meld seamlessly into a singular entity. You'll search in vain for welding seams - each frame receives meticulous finishing touches. The Bosch Performance Line CX motor with 85 Nm and the compact carrier with MIK system seamlessly merge into the frame design, leading observers to assume: the Homage must be forged as one piece. Moreover, the minimalist cockpit is fully integrated, offering a consistently clean and sophisticated view at all times.

name: F01124
value:
Enjoyable Riding Experience

From urban streets to rural roads, enjoy every moment.

Whether you're riding, charging the batteries, or securing it in the city, this full-suspension low-step-through bike ensures maximum comfort at all times. The charging socket is conveniently positioned ergonomically, allowing for easy charging directly on the bike. Additionally, the specially designed closing cap adds to the convenience. The lock is also ergonomically placed on the carrier, enabling swift locking and unlocking. For those seeking even more comfort, consider the optional comfort kit with curved handlebars and a wide saddle, or a saddle that can be lowered using a remote control.

name: F01124
value:
DualBattery 1250
Enhanced DualBattery Technology, developed by Riese & Müller, guarantees double the range or greater climbing capabilities, fewer charging stops, and extended riding enjoyment. With the introduction of the 1,250 Wh option, entirely new destinations become accessible, alleviating concerns about range limitations in your daily travels.
£1,119.00

name: F01124
value:
Kiox 300 cockpit
The Kiox 300 display seamlessly integrates into the cockpit, enhancing aesthetics with internal cabling for a clean, minimalist look. The adjustable stem angle offers versatility, allowing riders to choose between a sporty or upright seating position. Designed with sporty riders in mind, the Kiox 300 display provides more than just fitness data, aiding in training optimization. Additionally, it can be paired with heart rate monitors via Bluetooth for comprehensive performance tracking. Map-free navigation, available when paired with a smartphone, adds further functionality to the Kiox 300. Intuitive operation is facilitated by the LED Remote on the handlebars.
£75.00

name: F01124
value:
Comfort kit
The perfect option for anyone wanting to ride in greater comfort: the classically curved handlebars and wider saddle enable you to sit comfortably in an upright position.
£0.00

name: F01124
value:
GX option
If off-road cycling is your passion, enhance your E-Bike with premium Schwalbe all-terrain tires. Engineered with flat tire studs along the center of the tread, they offer minimal rolling resistance, enabling faster speeds on straight paths. Meanwhile, the sturdy tire studs on the tire's shoulders ensure exceptional grip, especially during cornering maneuvers.
£47.00

name: F01124
value:
Lowerable saddle
With the lowered saddle, you can easily come to a comfortable stop without needing to dismount. Controlled remotely, the saddle adjusts, allowing your feet to reach the ground effortlessly.
£94.00

name: F01124
value:
Front carrier
Stay active while having all your essentials at hand. The front carrier allows you to safely secure up to 5 kg of luggage directly to the frame, ensuring it's protected from impacts and vibrations. With bungee cords, items like a sleeping bag, sports bag, or provisions can be quickly and securely fastened in place. You'll soon find the front luggage carrier to be an invaluable asset for your adventures.
£94.00

name: F01124
value:
Front carrier with bag
Stay mobile while carrying all your essentials. Secure up to 5 kg of luggage on the front carrier, attached to the frame and benefiting from the bike's full suspension, ensuring your cargo is well-protected from bumps and jolts. The bag provides ample space with a volume of up to 18 liters. With its zipper and roll closure, your belongings remain shielded from dirt and rain. Easily removable, the bag transforms into a shoulder bag using the supplied strap. Additionally, two outer pockets with waterproof zippers offer secure storage for smaller items.
The standard headlight is mounted on the handlebar, illuminating your path as you steer. Optionally, the headlight can be mounted on the front luggage carrier, ensuring excellent visibility ahead with its powerful beam.
£187.00

name: F01106
value:
Confidence built in.

With optional Bosch ABS 2.0, sudden stops stay smooth — no skidding, no surprises. Powerful Magura disc brakes deliver instant control, and the rear light with brake light keeps you seen. A bright headlight and wide beam cut through the dark, lighting every ride.

name: F01106
value:
Connected e-bike.

RX Connect takes your riding experience to a new level. You can completely secure your bike with the optionally integrated RX Chip and matching RX Service. Activate ConnectRide Free in the first year free of charge: the RX Connect app shows the location of your bike, offers a digital motion alarm and automatically records rides with extensive riding statistics. To benefit permanently from this offer, you can then take advantage of the paid ConnectRide service.

name: F01106
value:
Integrated cockpit. Total control.

Tidy cables, smart tech. The optional cockpit with Kiox 300 display keeps your ride stats front and centre on a crisp colour screen. Adjust the stem for comfort or speed. Prefer simple? The standard Intuvia 100 still keeps it clean and clear. Switch modes on the fly with the LED Remote — colour-coded, at your fingertips.

name: F01106
value:
Ready for anything.

The MIK carrier system handles it all — bags, baskets, panniers, even a child seat (up to 27 kg). Swap accessories in seconds. Whatever you’re carrying, it’s secure, stable, and hassle-free.

name: F01106
value:
Sleek frame. Serious power.

A sleek 750 Wh battery and Bosch motor deliver up to 100 km per charge. Add the bottle-sized PowerMore 250 for 50 km more — just clip it on and ride.

name: F01107
value:
Comfort that smooths it all out.

Cobblestones, gravel, potholes — barely noticeable thanks to the suspension fork and seatpost. Add the comfort kit for a relaxed upright ride with a wide saddle and swept-back bars. Like riding on fresh tarmac, wherever you go.

name: F01107
value:
Confidence built in.

With optional Bosch ABS 2.0, sudden stops stay smooth — no skidding, no surprises. Powerful Magura disc brakes deliver instant control, and the rear light with brake light keeps you seen. A bright headlight and wide beam cut through the dark, lighting every ride.

name: F01107
value:
Connected e-bike.

RX Connect takes your riding experience to a new level. You can completely secure your bike with the optionally integrated RX Chip and matching RX Service. Activate ConnectRide Free in the first year free of charge: the RX Connect app shows the location of your bike, offers a digital motion alarm and automatically records rides with extensive riding statistics. To benefit permanently from this offer, you can then take advantage of the paid ConnectRide service.

name: F01107
value:
Integrated cockpit. Total control.

Tidy cables, smart tech. The optional cockpit with Kiox 300 display keeps your ride stats front and centre on a crisp colour screen. Adjust the stem for comfort or speed. Prefer simple? The standard Intuvia 100 still keeps it clean and clear. Switch modes on the fly with the LED Remote — colour-coded, at your fingertips.

name: F01107
value:
Ready for anything.

The MIK carrier system handles it all — bags, baskets, panniers, even a child seat (up to 27 kg). Swap accessories in seconds. Whatever you’re carrying, it’s secure, stable, and hassle-free.

name: F01107
value:
Sleek frame. Serious power.

A sleek 750 Wh battery and Bosch motor deliver up to 100 km per charge. Add the bottle-sized PowerMore 250 for 50 km more — just clip it on and ride.

name: F01107
value:
Kiox 300 cockpit
The Kiox 300 display is perfect for sporty riders: it displays more than just fitness data, helping riders to optimise their training. It is even possible to pair it with heart rate monitors via Bluetooth. Map-free navigation (only in conjunction with a smartphone) completes the features of the Kiox 300. It can be intuitively operated using the LED Remote on the handlebars.
£47.00

name: F01130
value:
Smart displays

At the technological forefront.

You can equip the control hub of the Roadster to meet your needs: the standard Bosch Purion 200 display is inconspicuously attached to the handlebar and provides the most important data and functions. You can also use navigation, route planning and other features with the optional Kiox 300 display.

name: F01130
value:
Safe on the road

See and be seen.

The powerful headlamp with daytime running light ensures better visibility in road traffic. When you’re on the go in the dark, nothing comes between you and your sporty ride, thanks to even illumination of your way and your surroundings. The Magura disc brakes ensure reliable braking even during sporty rides.

name: F01130
value:
Sporty design

Speed gets the right frame.

Its slim frame design gives the Roadster its sporty character: the frame’s sleek design is reminiscent of conventional bikes, while it meets the highest standards of outstanding German engineering. The Bosch Performance Line CX motor, boasting 85 Nm, and the integrated battery with 625 Wh are installed in a balanced position for top agility and riding enjoyment. The integrated cabling accentuates the linear appearance..

name: F01130
value:
Frame lock with chain lock and bag
The sturdy Abus chain lock, in addition to the Abus Shield frame lock, provides twice the security for your E-Bike. The 130 cm long chain is latched onto the frame lock and the bike can be quickly attached to the nearest lamppost or lock it together with up to three other bikes. The chain thickness of 6 mm ensures a high level of anti-theft protection. Especially practical: frame lock, chain lock and battery lock all use the same key. The bag is firmly attached to the saddle and allows quick and easy removal of the chain lock thanks to its ergonomic shape and Fidlock magnetic closure. Please note: for smaller frame sizes the lowest saddle position may not be usable when the lock bag is fitted.
£94.00

name: F01130
value:
Kiox 300 cockpit
The Kiox 300 display is perfect for sporty riders: it displays more than just fitness data, helping riders to optimise their training. It is even possible to pair it with heart rate monitors via Bluetooth. Map-free navigation (only in conjunction with a smartphone) completes the features of the Kiox 300. It can be intuitively operated using the LED Remote on the handlebars.
£47.00

name: F01130
value:
Front carrier
The front carrier fits perfectly into the overall aesthetics of the stylish front. It has a centrally fixed base plate and a sophisticated luggage strap system that allows various items of luggage to be secured.
£94.00

name: F01130
value:
Carrier
Baskets and panniers can be secured to the carrier in no time, thanks to the racktime “Snapit” system. With just a click, your load can be changed quicker than a pit stop. Accessories can be obtained from your dealer.
£75.00

name: F01130
value:
Comfort kit
The perfect option for anyone wanting to ride in greater comfort: the classically curved handlebar, suspension seatpost and Ergon handles enable you to sit comfortably in an upright position.
£47.00

name: F01130
value:
Equipment for everyday use

Comfortable yet sporty while on the move.

Dynamism teamed with the comfort required for everyday life: while you feel the wind in your hair, the Suntour NCX suspension fork cushions the cobblestones and potholes in the road. And if you’d prefer even more comfort, simply opt for optional comfort kit with its curved handlebar, Ergon handles and suspension seatpost. You don’t have to do without anything when it comes to transport either: the optional carrier with the Racktime Snapit system or the front luggage carrier with loading area make the Roadster a sporty everyday companion.

name: F01147
value:
Carrier baskets
The pannier baskets can be fitted on the right and left, rather like panniers. This leaves the carrier free to be used for other things. Their large storage space of approx. 22 litres was designed to carry shopping bags each weighing up to 7 kg.
£159.00

name: F01147
value:
Easy to handle

You can rely on that.

The carbon belt drive offers a wonderfully smooth ride, at the same time being low-maintenance and reliable. Dirt and oil stains, as was the case with chain drives, are now a thing of the past. The twist shift grip and Magura hydraulic rim brakes guarantee comfortable and safe everyday cycling. And the standard Abus frame lock is just as reliable.

name: F01147
value:
Kiox 300 cockpit
The Kiox 300 display is perfect for sporty riders: it displays more than just fitness data, helping riders to optimise their training. It is even possible to pair it with heart rate monitors via Bluetooth. Map-free navigation (only in conjunction with a smartphone) completes the features of the Kiox 300. It can be intuitively operated using the LED Remote on the handlebars.
£47.00

name: F01147
value:
Front basket
Give your E-Bike new charm and especially practicality. The strong and weatherproof front basket with its classy rattan look completes the image of a contemporary roadster. It holds around 12 litres and can carry up to 5 kg of weight.
£94.00

name: F01147
value:
Transport baskets

Practical – a perfect look.

The perfectly fitting, optional baskets have been developed with a click system specifically for the Swing. Sturdy, weatherproof and with a sophisticated rattan look, they complete the image of a modern roadster. The front basket holding approximately 12 litres can be loaded with up to 5 kg. The carrier baskets can be fitted to the right, left or on both sides at the same time, like panniers. This leaves the carrier with MIK system free to be used for other things. Their large storage space of approx. 22 litres was designed to carry shopping bags each weighing up to 7 kg.

name: F01147
value:
Additional chain lock with bag
The sturdy Abus chain lock, in addition to the Abus Shield frame lock, provides twice the security for your E-Bike. The 130 cm long chain is latched onto the frame lock and you can quickly lock your bike to the nearest lamppost or lock it together with up to three other bikes. The chain thickness of 6 mm ensures a high level of anti-theft protection. Especially practical: frame lock, chain lock and battery lock all use the same key. The bag is firmly attached to the saddle and allows quick and easy removal of the chain lock thanks to its ergonomic shape and Fidlock magnetic closure. Please note: for smaller frame sizes the lowest saddle position may not be usable when the lock bag is fitted.
£47.00

name: F01147
value:
Front and Rear Baskets
Give your E-Bike new charm and especially practicality. The strong and weatherproof front basket with its classy rattan look completes the image of a contemporary roadster. It holds around 12 litres and can carry up to 5 kg of weight.
The pannier baskets can be fitted on the right and left, rather like panniers. This leaves the carrier free to be used for other things. Their large storage space of approx. 22 litres was designed to carry shopping bags each weighing up to 7 kg.
£243.00

name: F01147
value:
Elegant frame design

Delights the legs, pleases the eye.

The shape of the frame is reminiscent of a traditional roadster. And you’re guaranteed to reach your destination in comfort, thanks to its suspension fork and suspension seatpost. It powerfully assists you with a 500 Wh carrier battery in conjunction with the seamlessly integrated Bosch Performance Line motor. The low step-through ensures comfortable handling in urban traffic, while the integrated cabling accentuates its elegant appearance.

name: F01200
value:
Effortless to ride. Easy to live with.

The Packster2 70 handles like a pro — smooth to steer, simple to park, and easy to hop on and off. Its cable steering lets you glide through tight spots, even fully loaded. Need more space? The rear carrier adds room for up to 27 kg of extra cargo.

name: F01200
value:
Built for families. Better for the planet.

The Packster2 70 simplifies everyday life — and it’s made from eco-friendly materials throughout.

name: F01200
value:
See clearly. Stay in control.

A powerful headlight with daytime running light and well-placed reflectors keeps you visible at all times. The optional Bosch ABS and Magura disc brakes add extra stopping power and control — preventing skids and slips, even in sudden stops.

name: F01200
value:
Equipped for the future.

Smart, safe, and sustainable.

The EPP transport box is fully recyclable and made with zero emissions. Optional child seats include five-point belts and side-impact protection for peace of mind. Add the buggy kit for easy access with half-height side walls — all within a tough frame that supports the weather cover and shields your passengers.

name: F01200
value:
Connected e-bike.

RX Connect takes your riding experience to a new level. You can completely secure your bike with the standard, integrated RX Chip and the RX Service to go along with it. Activate ConnectRide Free for one year free of charge: the RX Connect app shows the location of your bike, offers a digital motion alarm and automatically records rides with extensive riding statistics.

name: F01200
value:
DualBattery 1500 – Go further. Climb higher.
With a massive 1,500 Wh of power, Riese & Müller’s DualBattery tech delivers double the range, fewer charging stops, and the freedom to take on bigger adventures — or just forget about range altogether in daily life.
£1212.00

name: F01200
value:
Three Child Seats – Room for the whole crew.

£271.00

Carry up to three children (age seven or younger) with secure five-point belts and recycled headrests. The third seat folds down for cargo space, or all seats can be folded to free up even more room. Check local regulations before transporting children by bike.

name: F01200
value:
Glove Compartment Lock – Small items, safely stored.

£28.00

The glove compartment lock means small items are safely stowed away. The lock uses the same key as the battery lock and Abus frame lock and replaces the standard magnetic closure.

name: F01200
value:
Double Child Seat – Safe, flexible, and made for two.

£187.00

Comfortably seats two children up to age seven, with adjustable sitting and sleeping positions. Five-point harnesses keep them secure, and the headrest — made from 100% recycled material — folds flat when not in use. Need more space? Just fold up the seat to carry larger loads. Check local regulations before transporting children by bike.

name: F01200
value:
Double Child Seat with Front Luggage Shelf – Smart space for kids and cargo.

£243.00

Double Child Seat with Front Luggage Shelf – Flexible for family and cargo. Seats two children up to age seven with five-point belts and recycled headrests. The seat folds up for extra space. The front shelf holds a crate-sized load when down, or acts as a table with foot space when up. The 47 L food-safe box fits neatly on the rack or in a shopping trolley. Check local regulations before transporting children

name: F01200
value:
Cargo Carry System – Adaptable by design.

£187.00

Modular polypropylene elements let you customise the space to suit your load. Configure up to three compartments, use the flat surface, or secure Euro boxes with built-in holders and side pockets. Four eyelets allow for extra straps when carrying taller cargo.

name: F01200
value:
Buggy – Safe, smart, and built for little passengers.

£327.00

The Buggy option makes family transport easy and secure. Half-height side walls and a step let kids climb in and out with ease, while the sturdy aluminium frame and polypropylene roof offer extra protection — even in a collision. The water-repellent cover avoids PVC and includes tinted windows, roll-up sides, and a rear panel to shield against wind and rain. Max load: 70 kg. Please check local laws before transporting children by bike.

name: F01200
value:
Box with Tarpaulin – Weatherproof your load.

£75.00

The durable tarpaulin keeps cargo clean and dry in any weather. It can be half or fully rolled back, letting children ride comfortably while staying protected.

name: F01200
value:
Box with High Cover – Maximum space, full protection.

£280.00

Made from durable EPP, the high, lockable cover protects up to 375 L of cargo. The low loading height keeps access quick and easy.

name: F01200
value:
Box with Flat Cover – Secure, weatherproof storage.

£159.00

This lockable cover shields up to 240 L of cargo from the elements. Made from folding polypropylene, it opens easily for quick loading and unloading.

name: F01200
value:
Box with Child Cover – All-weather protection.

£280.00

Shields children from wind, rain, snow, and sun. The height adjusts with the handlebar, and the partial opening and built-in sunshade offer airflow and comfort on warmer days.

name: F01200
value:
Performance Kit – Built to push harder.
With powerful Tektro TRP C 2.3 brakes, premium Supernova lighting, and a suspension seatpost, the Performance Kit delivers serious control, comfort, and confidence. Brake harder, see further, and ride smoother — even under heavy loads.
£466.00

name: F01200
value:
Pannier Rack – Minimalist, functional, integrated.
Designed for up to 5 kg per side, this sleek rack keeps your panniers secure without adding bulk. Rear and brake lights are seamlessly built in — a clean look with smart function.

name: F01200
value:
Offroad Kit – Grip that goes anywhere.
Tackle rough terrain with Schwalbe Smart Sam Plus tires. A wide centre tread keeps you rolling fast, while aggressive side lugs grip hard in corners. Plus, a 3 mm puncture guard adds tough protection where it counts.
£47.00

name: F01200
value:
Kiox 300 – Smart, sporty, connected.
Track fitness, pair with heart rate monitors via Bluetooth, and navigate without maps when linked to your phone. The Kiox 300 puts training insights and ride control right at your fingertips — all operated through the intuitive LED Remote.
£47.00

name: F01200
value:
Comfort Kit – Sit back and relax.
With swept-back handlebars and a wide saddle, the Comfort Kit lets you ride in a relaxed, upright position — perfect for cruising in comfort.

name: F01200
value:
Bosch eBike ABS 2.0 – Control when it counts.
Stay firmly in the saddle, even under hard braking. On asphalt or gravel, ABS 2.0 prevents skids, rear wheel lift, and sideways slips — for safer, more confident stops in any situation.
£466.00

name: F01200
value:
Additional Chain Lock with Vaude Bag – Extra security, neatly packed.
The 130 cm Abus chain lock pairs with the frame lock for added protection — tough 6 mm links that secure your bike to fixed objects or lock multiple bikes together. One key fits the frame, chain, and battery locks. The lock stows in a Vaude saddle bag made from 100% recycled polyester, with a roll-top design for quick, easy access. Note: May limit saddle height on smaller frames.
£47.00

name: F00932
value:
High sidewalls with hard cover

280.00

The high sidewalls with hard cover are ideal for protecting larger loads during transport. Lockable and firmly bolted in place, the cover reliably secures your transport goods. It can be locked in a partially opened position and two comfortable, separate seats can be fitted in the storage space for optionally transporting children.

name: F00932
value:
Adjustable seating position

Change riders with ease.

Thanks to the angle- and height-adjustable stem and the adjustable saddle height, the seat position can be altered to accommodate body sizes of from 1.50 m to 2.00 m, and adapted from sporty to comfortable. The overall geometry of the bike can be perfectly adjusted to the rider in just a few easy steps. This flexibility makes the Load ideal for shared use, for example within a family.

name: F01170
value:
Child cover

£187.00

The child cover reliably protects your younger passengers from the wind, rain and sun. It can be combined with the optional Flex Box, which can still be easily folded out and closed even when the child cover is fitted. The cover includes an additional panel that you can either use to darken the viewing window or as a rear panel. We have deliberately refrained from using fibreglass rods and PVC film material in the production process.
* The Child cover option is only available in conjunction with the "Flex Box" option.

name: F01170
value:
Flex Box

£373.00

The Flex Box is an extension of the Basic Box (45 by 30 cm) for transporting larger loads and offers numerous transport options both when folded out and in. When collapsed, it is high enough to transport a regular drinks crate. And when folded out, its extended area of approx. 45 by 65 cm provides ample space for your weekly shopping or sports bag. It is fitted with a box lock that protects your load from unwanted access, if need be.

name: F01170
value:
Built for the future.

We have based the design of the Carrie on circular design principles. Its minimalist frame, 80% of which is made of recycled aluminium, is powder-coated to conserve resources. Carrie accessories are easy to dismantle, clean and repair, if necessary.

name: F01170
value:
A bike for any time and anywhere.

Minimal parking space and tight curves: you no longer have these worries with the Carrie. You can now ride around town with ease, just like on a normal bike, thanks to its 43 cm slim Basic Box. And, with a compact length of just two metres, there is always space for the Carrie in every bike store room.

name: F01170
value:
Connected e-bike.

RX Connect takes your riding experience to a new level. You can completely secure your bike with the optionally integrated RX Chip and matching RX Service. Activate ConnectRide Free in the first year free of charge: the RX Connect app shows the location of your bike, offers a digital motion alarm and automatically records rides with extensive riding statistics. To benefit permanently from this offer, you can then take advantage of the paid ConnectRide service.

name: F01170
value:
Flexible transport solutions.

With the Flex Box, its name says it all: when collapsed, it holds a regular drinks crate, and even up to three when folded out. The box can be securely locked and extended with a high-quality cargo bag. You can carry your little ones on an adjustable child seat with protective cover.

name: F01170
value: The ideal cargo bike for anyone with lots to transport but minimal space.

name: F01170
value:
Kiox 300 cockpit
The Kiox 300 display is perfect for sporty riders: it displays more than just fitness data, helping riders to optimise their training. It is even possible to pair it with heart rate monitors via Bluetooth. Map-free navigation (only in conjunction with a smartphone) completes the features of the Kiox 300. It can be intuitively operated using the LED Remote on the handlebars.
£47.00

name: F01170
value:
Child seat

£187.00

A sturdy bench seat that can be suspended in the Flex Box in two different ways serves as a child seat. Depending on its position, it will accommodate either one taller or two smaller children age seven or younger – reliably protected by the five-point seat belts. And the comfortable back cushion automatically folds in when the Flex Box is closed. Please observe national regulations for the transport of children on bikes before using.
The Child seat option is only available in conjunction with the "Flex Box" option.

name: F01170
value:
Cargo bag

£280.00

The practical Dyed in the Wool Cargo bag holds up to 90 litres. Two handles allow you to conveniently load and unload your luggage. Alternatively, pre-drilled holes mean that you can screw the Cargo bag permanently to the floor of the Basic Box. Use the zipped pocket on the outside of the Cargo bag to hold smaller items. It was hand-crafted in Europe and is made of recycled Ecopak material known for its sturdiness and durability.
* The Child cover option is only available in conjunction with the "Flex Box" option.

name: F01170
value:
Child cover

£187.00

The child cover reliably protects your younger passengers from the wind, rain and sun. It can be combined with the optional Flex Box, which can still be easily folded out and closed even when the child cover is fitted. The cover includes an additional panel that you can either use to darken the viewing window or as a rear panel. We have deliberately refrained from using fibreglass rods and PVC film material in the production process.
* The Child cover option is only available in conjunction with the "Flex Box" option.

name: F01170
value:
Child seat with headrest

£233.00

The headrest offers additional safety, especially when transporting taller children. A sturdy bench seat that can be suspended in the Flex Box in two different ways serves as a child seat. Depending on its position, it will accommodate either one taller or two smaller children age seven or younger – reliably protected by the five-point seat belts. And the comfortable back cushion automatically folds in when the Flex Box is closed. However, when the headrest is fitted, it cannot be closed. Please observe national regulations for the transport of children on bikes before using.

name: F01170
value:
Flex Box

£373.00

The Flex Box is an extension of the Basic Box (45 by 30 cm) for transporting larger loads and offers numerous transport options both when folded out and in. When collapsed, it is high enough to transport a regular drinks crate. And when folded out, its extended area of approx. 45 by 65 cm provides ample space for your weekly shopping or sports bag. It is fitted with a box lock that protects your load from unwanted access, if need be.

name: F01170
value:
Rear Carrier

£94.00

The carrier with MIK system provides even more storage space: you can quickly and securely attach pannier racks, baskets, bike accessories, and even a dog basket, to the sturdy adapter plate. Accessories can be obtained from your dealer.
