name: F01356_1209140719153055
value:
Performance Package
The Performance Package consisting of performance brakes and lights as well as a suspension seatpost offers you even more riding pleasure. The Tektro TRP C 2.3 cargo brake can withstand extreme constant loads and provides great stability and reduced wear. The Supernova M99 Mini Pro headlight offers the best lighting conditions, while the Supernova M99 Tail Light with brake light ensures maximum safety. The suspension seatpost absorbs vibrations and shocks and helps ensure a comfortable ride
£466.00

name: F01356_1209140719153055
value:
Control Technology Package
The Control Technology Package, consisting of a suspension rear stay, Performance brakes and light, provides maximum riding pleasure and ultimate comfort. Vibrations and hard knocks are simply ironed out, thanks to the perfectly coordinated full suspension of the rear swing arm. The Tektro TRP C 2.3 cargo brake can withstand constant loads and provides great stability and reduced wear. The Supernova M99 Mini Pro headlight offers the best lighting conditions: the switch to high beam ensures a level of visibility otherwise only known with cars, especially in the forest and out of town, while the Supernova M99 Tail Light with brake light ensures maximum safety.
£932.00

name: F01356_1209140719153055
value:
Bosch eBike ABS 2.0
The Bosch eBike ABS 2.0 with Magura ABS brake ensure that you remain safely in the saddle even when you need to brake suddenly – both on solid asphalt roads or gravel tracks. It prevents tires from slipping, the rear wheel lifting and the whole bike skidding out to the sid
£466.00

name: F01356_1209140719153055
value:
GX option
If you like riding your E-Bike off-road, then simply equip it with first-class all-terrain tires. The SnakeSkin side wall of the Schwalbe Smart Sam Plus tires guarantees exceptional grip especially when cornering. A 3 mm protective cover around the inner tube provides extra-secure puncture resistance.
£47.00

name: F01356_1209140719153055
value:
Comfort kit
The perfect option for anyone wanting to ride in greater comfort: the classically curved handlebars and wider saddle enable you to sit comfortably in an upright position.
£0.00

name: F01356_1209140719153055
value:
Pannier rack
The minimalist pannier rack is ideal for fixing panniers weighing up to 5 kg each. The rear and brake lights are unobtrusively integrated into it. The “Form follows function” design principle has been exceptionally well executed with the pannier rack
£0.00

name: F01356_1209140719153055
value:
Carrier (for Control Technology Package)
If the front storage space is not enough, there is always the optional carrier. It is ideal for attaching panniers, making it perfect for longer bike trips too. The carrier can carry up to 15 kg of weight. Since it is secured directly to the frame, it also benefits from the suspension thanks to Control Technology.
£47.00

name: F01356_1209140719153055
value:
Additional chain lock with bag
The sturdy Abus chain lock, in addition to the Abus Shield frame lock, provides twice the security for your E-Bike. The 130 cm long chain is latched onto the frame lock and you can quickly lock your bike to the nearest lamppost or lock it together with up to three other bikes. The chain thickness of 6 mm ensures a high level of anti-theft protection. Especially practical: frame lock, chain lock and battery lock all use the same key. The bag is firmly attached to the saddle and allows quick and easy removal of the chain lock thanks to its ergonomic shape and Fidlock magnetic closure. Please note: for smaller frame sizes the lowest saddle position may not be usable when the lock bag is fitted..
£47.00

name: F01356_1209140719153055
value:
Double child seat and luggage shelf at the front

£243.00

The double child seat with adjustable sitting and sleeping position holds two children age seven or younger. Five-point belts ensure maximum safety. Our child seats with continuous headrest are made of 100% recycled material. The front luggage rack offers maximum storage space. When folded down, it lets you transport luggage up to the size of a crate of water, and secure it, thanks to eyelets and other fastening options with additional straps. Alternatively, the luggage rack can also be used as a table for your children with space underneath for their feet. When folded up, it creates a luggage compartment, the rubber straps of which securely fix slimmer objects, like shoulder bags, in place. The 47-litre box supplied fits perfectly onto the luggage rack or into a shopping trolley and, thanks to its food-safe and recyclable PP design, is ideal for your weekly shopping. Alternatively, you can transport larger loads by folding up the seat part of the double child seat. Please observe national regulations for the transport of children on bikes before using.

name: F01356_1209140719153055
value:
Three child seats

£271.00

The double child seat with adjustable sitting and sleeping position along with a rear-facing single seat at the front allow you to carry up to three children age seven or younger. Five-point belts ensure maximum safety. Our child seats with continuous headrest are made of 100% recycled material. Alternatively, the seat part of the third child seat can be folded back to create a separate luggage compartment. For even more storage space, the seat parts of the double child seat can be folded up to the rear and those of the third child seat to the front. Please observe national regulations for the transport of children on bikes before using..

name: F01356_1209140719153055
value:
Cargo Carry System

£187.00

With its versatile polypropylene elements, the Cargo Carry System enables loads of various sizes to be safely transported. Depending on your needs, you have the option of a flat cargo surface, storage space in the bottom of the EPP box, up to three load compartments and a securing element for standard Euro boxes with two side pockets for smaller objects. In the event of a higher load, the cargo can be secured with additional straps using four eyelets.

name: F01356_1209140719153055
value:
High box cover

£280.00

The high, lockable box cover made of EPP allows you to transport goods with the best protection and a maximum volume of about 375 L. And loading and unloading is still easy thanks to the low loading height.

name: F01356_1209140719153055
value:
Child cover

£280.00

The year-round cover provides protection from the wind, rain, snow and sun in any season. Its height can be adjusted depending on the position of the handlebar. The practical partial opening function and additional sun protection provide shade and pleasant cooling in summer.

name: F01356_1209140719153055
value:
Lock for glove compartment

£28.00

The glove compartment lock means small items are safely stowed away. The lock uses the same key as the battery lock and Abus frame lock and replaces the standard magnetic closure.

name: F01356_1209140719153055
value:
Flexible load transport

The right solution for any transport task.

The Packster 70 offers a 70-cm-long and 60-cm-wide loading surface and, with basic equipment, provides a cargo space of up to 240 litres. With the optional Cargo Carry System, the shock-absorbing and insulating EPP box can adapt to any transport project. Whether you need a level cargo surface, secure transport for standard Euro boxes or storage space for smaller objects – the Cargo Carry System protects your cargo thanks to versatile elements and diverse adjustment options. You can even transport up to approx. 375 litres, securely sealed, with the optional high box cover (loading surface approved for up to 70 kg).

name: F01356_1209140719153055
value:
Safe handling

Simply and safely through everyday life.

Whether you are riding or parking, getting on and off or loading – the Packster 70 is incredibly simple to use at all times. Its small turning circle means that it is ideal for riding and manoeuvring in tight spaces. And its optional Bosch eBike ABS 2.0 with Magura disc brakes ensures that you retain control even if you have to brake suddenly: it reliably prevents tires from sliding, the rear wheel from lifting, and the whole bike from skidding out to the side. But even its standard Tektro disc brakes pack quite a punch if you have to stop quickly. The combination of high-performance headlight with daytime running light and well distributed reflectors guarantees that you can see and be seen.

name: F01356_1209140719153055
value:
Adjustable seating position

Change riders with ease.

The height-adjustable saddle and stem let you adjust the seating position of the Packster 70 to different body heights from 1.50 m to 2.00 m in the blink of an eye, making it the perfect companion to family life and a flexible replacement for your car.

name: F01356_1209140719153055
value:
Control Technology Package

Maximum riding enjoyment.

The optional Control Technology Package with the Riese & Müller Control Technology is synonymous with safety and dynamism: the perfectly tuned full suspension of the rear swing arm ensures a sporty riding experience and the best traction even at high speeds. The active rear swing arm, optimised front wheel suspension and co-sprung luggage carrier form the core of the Control Technology. The result is powerful propulsion and sporty riding without any loss of energy.

name: F01356_1209140719153055
value:
Flat box cover

£159.00

The flat, lockable box cover allows you to protect transported goods with a volume of up to 240 L against wind and weather. The folding polypropylene cover allows for easy loading and unloading.

name: F01356_1209140719153055
value:
Double child seat

£187.00

The double child seat with adjustable sitting and sleeping position holds two children age seven or younger. Five-point belts ensure maximum safety. Our child seats with continuous headrest are made of 100% recycled material. The headrest can be folded down into the box if required. Alternatively, you can transport larger loads by folding up the seat part of the double child seat. Please observe national regulations for the transport of children on bikes before using.

name: F01131
value:
Safe on the road

See and be seen.

The powerful headlamp with daytime running light ensures better visibility in road traffic. When you’re on the go in the dark, nothing comes between you and your sporty ride, thanks to even illumination of your way and your surroundings. The Magura disc brakes ensure reliable braking even during sporty rides.

name: F01131
value:
Equipment for everyday use

Comfortable yet sporty while on the move.

Dynamism teamed with the comfort required for everyday life: while you feel the wind in your hair, the Suntour NCX suspension fork cushions the cobblestones and potholes in the road. And if you’d prefer even more comfort, simply opt for optional comfort kit with its curved handlebar, Ergon handles and suspension seatpost. You don’t have to do without anything when it comes to transport either: the optional carrier with the Racktime Snapit system or the front luggage carrier with loading area make the Roadster a sporty everyday companion.

name: F01131
value:
Sporty design

Speed gets the right frame.

Its slim frame design gives the Roadster its sporty character: the frame’s sleek design is reminiscent of conventional bikes, while it meets the highest standards of outstanding German engineering. The integrated cabling accentuates the linear appearance..

name: F01315
value:
Integrated Pinion MGU E1.12

Power & Precision

The Pinion MGU E1.12 combines an 85 Nm mid-mounted motor with a sealed 12-speed gearbox for smooth, responsive performance and minimal maintenance. Enjoy instant shifting, precise gear changes, and unparalleled reliability on every ride.

Control Technology & Comfort

Ultimate Stability

Featuring a Fox AWL 34 fork (120 mm travel), Fox Float Rhythm shock (110 mm travel), and a co-sprung rear rack, the Delite5 delivers unmatched comfort and stability across all terrains.

High-Capacity Battery & Long Range

Ride Further

With a removable 800 Wh TubePack battery (up to 100 miles in Eco mode) and optional dual-battery setup (up to 160 miles), the Delite5 ensures you’ll never worry about running out of power.

Durable Belt Drive & Low Maintenance

Clean & Reliable

The Gates Carbon Belt Drive and sealed Pinion gearbox deliver nearly maintenance-free performance for up to 10,000 km. Enjoy quiet, durable, and hassle-free riding in any conditions.

name: F01520-1
value:
Cockpit with Remote display
Keep an eye on all the important information with the compact and attractive Remote display. This combination of control unit and high-resolution colour display can be intuitively operated without taking your hand off the handlebars. The Remote display is perfectly integrated into the cockpit, with the internal cabling creating a clean look. Charge your smartphone while you ride using the USB-C charging socket. The angle-adjustable stem lets you switch between a sportier or more upright seat position.
Fitted As Standard

name: F01520-1
value:
Comfort kit
The perfect option for anyone wanting to ride in greater comfort: the classically curved handlebars and wider saddle enable you to sit comfortably in an upright position.
No Additional Charge

name: F01520-1
value:
GX option
If you like to go off-road, you can equip your E-Bike with Schwalbe's exceptional Johnny Watts tire. The flat knobs in the highest section have very low rolling resistance for fast trips on straight sections. The solid studs on the sides guarantee very good grip, especially when cornering. The wide VP 538 flat pedals offer the necessary grip for your feet.
£47.00

name: F01520-1
value:
Cockpit with Comfort display
Your riding data can easily be read in all weather on the large Comfort display. And, thanks to its Bluetooth connectivity, you also have many additional functions available. Choose between permanent installation with a locking screw or a removable Comfort display. It is simple and reliable to control using the Remote in thumb’s reach. Vibration feedback and backlit keys ensure perfect operation, even when wearing gloves and in the dark. The Comfort display is perfectly integrated into the cockpit, with the internal cabling creating a clean look. Charge your smartphone while you ride using the USB-C charging socket. The angle-adjustable stem lets you switch between a sportier or more upright seat position.
Additional £187.00

name: F01520-1
value:
Additional chain lock with Vaude bag
The sturdy Abus chain lock, in addition to the Abus frame lock, provides twice the security for your e-bike. The 130 cm long chain is latched onto the frame lock and you can quickly lock your bike to the nearest lamppost or lock it together with up to three other bikes. The chain thickness of 6 mm ensures a high level of anti-theft protection. Especially practical: frame lock, chain lock and battery lock all use the same key. The 100% recycled polyester Vaude bag is permanently attached to the saddle. You can remove the chain lock from the bag quickly and easily, thanks to its ergonomic shape and roll-up closure. Please note: for smaller frame sizes the lowest saddle position may not be usable when the lock bag is fitted.
£47.00

name: F01520-1
value:
Pannier rack
The minimalist pannier rack is ideal for fixing panniers weighing up to 7,5 kg each. The “Form follows function” design principle has been exceptionally well executed with the pannier rack.
No Additional Charge

name: F01520-1
value:
Front carrier
Being sporty when out and about – and yet still having everything you need with you. You can secure up to 5 kg of luggage on the front carrier, fixed to the frame and hence co-sprung, perfectly protected from knocks and bumps. Bungee cords secure a sleeping bag, small sports bag or provisions in place in no time at all. And you’ll come to appreciate your front luggage carrier just as quickly.
£94.00

name: F01520-1
value:
Cockpit with Multi-adapter
The Multi-adapter lets you extend the compact Remote display with your smartphone, combining all functions in one place: smart navigation with live weather, fitness data and much more. Other services and apps, such as music playback, can be controlled at the same time. A matching SP Connect smartphone case or bracket is available separately, as are further attachments for a bike computer. The Multi-adapter is perfectly integrated into the cockpit, with the internal cabling creating a clean look. Charge your smartphone while you ride using the USB-C charging socket. The angle-adjustable stem lets you switch between a sportier or more upright seat position.
Additional £47.00

name: F01520-1
value:
Control Technology

The Homage5 GT combines front suspension, a rear swing arm, and co-sprung luggage carrier, providing stability across varied terrains. With the optional Bosch eBike ABS, braking becomes even safer on challenging surfaces.

Innovative Frame Design

Crafted from 30% recycled aluminum, the Homage5 GT’s frame integrates the drive and suspension above the crank, offering both eco-friendliness and enhanced protection.

Enhanced Comfort

A low step-through design allows easy mounting, and the dropper seatpost offers quick height adjustments. The optional Comfort Kit, with curved handlebars and a wider saddle, enhances urban riding.

Smart Connectivity

An integrated RX Chip offers tracking, a motion alarm, and ride statistics. Enjoy a free year of ConnectRide, providing a connected, secure riding experience.

Integrated Pinion MGU E1.12

Power & Precision

The Pinion MGU E1.12 combines an 85 Nm mid-mounted motor with a sealed 12-speed gearbox for smooth, responsive performance and minimal maintenance. Enjoy instant shifting, precise gear changes, and unparalleled reliability on every ride.

Control Technology & Comfort

Ultimate Stability

Featuring a Fox AWL 34 fork (120 mm travel), Fox Float Rhythm shock (110 mm travel), and a co-sprung rear rack, the Delite5 delivers unmatched comfort and stability across all terrains.

High-Capacity Battery & Long Range

Ride Further

With a removable 800 Wh TubePack battery (up to 100 miles in Eco mode) and optional dual-battery setup (up to 160 miles), the Delite5 ensures you’ll never worry about running out of power.

Durable Belt Drive & Low Maintenance

Clean & Reliable

The Gates Carbon Belt Drive and sealed Pinion gearbox deliver nearly maintenance-free performance for up to 10,000 km. Enjoy quiet, durable, and hassle-free riding in any conditions.
